headline: Internet Computer Slides Amid Broader Altcoin Pullback
summary: Internet Computer (ICP) dropped 4.85% to $5.9149 on Tuesday, posting a low of $5.81 after peaking at $6.25 the previous day. Despite bullish headlines - a new partnership between Internet Computer developers DFINITY Foundation and indexing firm Maestro - the token succumbed to broad market rotation out of altcoins, including AI- and DeFi-linked assets. Read more: Solana Defies Market Drop, Touches $200 as Altcoins Retreat: Crypto Daybook Americas Maestro's infrastructure, funded by DFINITY, aims to build a Bitcoin metaprotocol index on the Internet Computer, enabling institutional-grade access to Ordinals and Runes , two of the most prominent primitives in the Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem. However, technical action reflected a more pessimistic short-term outlook. After opening at $6.2230, ICP steadily declined, breaking below $6.00 around 01:00 UTC and accelerating losses toward $5.83 support. Volume swelled above 1.3 million tokens during this segment, signaling large selling pressure, according to CoinDesk's technical analysis data model. ICP fell 2% from $5.97 to $5.87 during the U.S. morning, with concentrated sell pressure visible as the price pierced multiple support zones. Despite a brief rebound attempt near $6.02, the token failed to reclaim bullish footing, suggesting short-term momentum remains with the bears unless the $6.00 resistance is convincingly reclaimed, the data showed. Technical Analysis Highlights Price Range: $5.8105‚Äì$6.2488, representing 7.3% intraday spread. Volume: 1.94 million tokens traded; highest during breakdown below $5.90. Resistance: Strong rejection at $6.00‚Äì$6.02 range with no sustained breakout. Support: Critical base formed at $5.83‚Äì$5.87 amid heavy buying interest. From 13:09 to 14:08 UTC, ICP fell 2%, driven by sharp volume spikes exceeding 50K tokens/minute. Volatility: Full-day spread of $0.4383 reflects heightened intraday instability. headline: Bitcoin ETFs' 12-Day Inflow Streak Comes to an End as Price Stalls
summary: U.S.-listed spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds saw net outflows of $131.4 million on Monday, breaking a 12-day streak of uninterrupted inflows that brought in over $6 billion, according to data from Farside Investors. The pullback came as bitcoin (BTC) itself traded mostly flat to start the week. Prices continue to hover in a tight range on either side of $118,000 after a scorching run to a new record just below $124,000 two weeks ago. The now-ended ETF inflow streak coincided with that strong rally in bitcoin, the funds attracting more than $6 billion during the 12-day stretch. The outflows on Monday don‚Äôt necessarily signal a change in sentiment, but they mark a pause in what had been one of the strongest runs of ETF inflows since the funds launched. Meanwhile, altcoins ‚Äî after severely lagging bitcoin for months ‚Äî have gained investor favor for the moment. Ether-based ETFs, for instance, posted $296.5 million in inflows on Monday, now having brought in $8 billion in assets since July 2. The ETH/BTC ratio , which had been in decline for roughly three years ‚Äî has rebounded 24% over the past week and 39% over the past month. The divergence between bitcoin and ether ETF flows could reflect a rebalancing by investors looking to diversify within crypto or rotate into the newer offerings after a prolonged BTC rally. Despite the ETF cooling, bitcoin remains up nearly 20% over the past month and continues to trade near record highs. While volatility remains a factor, the data suggests that both investor interest and fresh capital are still flowing into the space ‚Äî even if not quite as steadily as last week.

headline: NEAR Slumps as Bitcoin Regains Strength, Ending Altcoin Surge
summary: NEAR Protocol slid sharply on Monday as intense selling pressure gripped the market, with the token breaking critical support levels despite surging trading volumes. The retreat comes as Bitcoin shows renewed strength, overshadowing last week‚Äôs ‚Äúaltcoin season‚Äù that saw smaller tokens briefly outperform the leading cryptocurrency. During the 24-hour period ending 22 July 14:00 UTC, NEAR fell 6% from $3.07 to $2.88, trading within a volatile $0.21 range. Heavy resistance around $3.05‚Äì$3.06 thwarted bullish attempts, while temporary support near $2.87‚Äì$2.92 failed under repeated retests. The decline accelerated in the final hour of trading, as NEAR slipped from $2.95 to $2.89 between 13:09 and 14:08 UTC. Massive volume spikes at 13:32 and 13:52 pushed through critical support levels at $2.93 and $2.90, cementing a bearish momentum that is raising questions about the sustainability of recent altcoin gains. Key Technical Indicators 24-Hour Price Action: Down 6% from $3.07 to $2.88; $0.21 trading range (~7% volatility). Resistance: Heavy-volume rejections at $3.05‚Äì$3.06. Support Levels: Temporary support at $2.87‚Äì$2.92, later broken. Volume: Exceeded 24-hour average of 3.89M; spikes of 267,564 and 296,686 units during key breakdowns. Final Hour Move: 2% drop from $2.95 to $2.89; extreme volatility and sharp selloffs. Critical Failures: Supports at $2.93 and $2.90 breached, setting new session lows. headline: Legendary Economist El-Erian Speaks Out on Fed Chair Jerome Powell's Resignation! "This Is the Most Logical Solution!"
summary: US President Donald Trump continues to pressure Fed Chair Jerome Powell to cut interest rates, while also calling for Powell's resignation. Trump has already begun discussions on Powell's replacement as his term approaches. At this point, while Powell's resignation continues to be a hot topic in the market, new statements came from famous economist Mohammed El-Erian, who frequently criticizes the FED and Powell regarding inflation. El-Erian, who thinks that the FED and Powell are responsible for inflation reaching these levels, said in his latest statement that Powell should resign. El-Erian, who shared a long post from his X account, said that Powell's resignation was the most logical solution. ‚ÄúIf Chairman Powell's goal is to preserve the Fed's operational autonomy (which I see as vital), then he should resign. I know this is not the general view that supports him remaining in office until the end of his term in May. Nor is it an impossible first step. Still, it's better than what's happening now‚Äîthe growing and widening threats to the Fed's independence‚Äîand will undoubtedly increase if he remains in office. As for market reaction, most of the frequently mentioned candidates to replace Chairman Powell are capable of calming potential market tensions. If Powell remains in office, the Fed's independence will be compromised. Therefore, I believe he should resign. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Legendary Economist El-Erian Speaks Out on Fed Chair Jerome Powell's Resignation! "This Is the Most Logical Solution!"

headline: Unlocking Future Security: AI Defense Panel Shines at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025
summary: BitcoinWorld Unlocking Future Security: AI Defense Panel Shines at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 For anyone navigating the rapidly evolving landscape where technology intersects with global stability, Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 is not just another conference. It‚Äôs a vital nexus where breakthrough ideas meet the real-world challenges that define our future. With over 10,000 startup and VC leaders converging, the event promises deep dives into critical topics. One of the most urgent conversations centers on how artificial intelligence is reshaping national defense, security, and critical infrastructure in real time. This is where the ‚ÄòAI Defense‚Äô panel comes in, a can‚Äôt-miss discussion taking place on one of the two dedicated AI Stages, bringing together leaders from government, venture capital, and the armed services to explore the high-stakes collision of innovation and national security. Why AI Defense is Critical Now The pace of AI‚Äôs evolution is blistering, making the stakes for defense innovation higher than ever. From autonomous systems and decision intelligence to cybersecurity and battlefield readiness, the U.S. defense and intelligence communities are in a race. Their goal is to build smarter, more adaptive technologies while ensuring ethical considerations, oversight, and safety are not compromised. This panel explores the delicate balance between intelligence capabilities and human control, the essential role of startups in driving defense innovation, and the multi-billion-dollar opportunities emerging at the intersection of national security and AI. If your startup touches defense, government, cybersecurity, or AI infrastructure, understanding the nuances of AI Defense is crucial for your strategic positioning and growth. Shaping National Security AI : Meet the Experts The ‚ÄòAI Defense‚Äô panel brings together an impressive lineup of thought leaders who are actively shaping the future of National Security AI . Their diverse backgrounds offer a comprehensive perspective on both the challenges and the immense potential of integrating advanced AI into defense strategies. Speaker Role Key Expertise Dr. Kathleen Fisher Director, Information Innovation Office, DARPA Leading 21st-century information warfare tech, blending deep research with strategic vision to give the U.S. and its allies a technological edge. Sri Chandrasekar Managing Partner, Point72 Ventures (formerly In-Q-Tel) Expert in identifying frontier technology and building investment frameworks that support the intelligence community‚Äôs toughest missions. Justin Fanelli Chief Technology Officer, Department of the Navy Driving digital transformation, cybersecurity, and innovation across complex government organizations, offering a vital boots-on-the-ground perspective. These leaders offer unparalleled insights into how AI is being developed and deployed to enhance defense capabilities while navigating complex ethical and operational landscapes. Their collective experience provides a unique opportunity to understand the practical applications and strategic implications of AI in a national security context. Driving Defense Innovation Through Collaboration The discussion will highlight the importance of collaboration between government agencies, venture capital firms, and private sector innovators in accelerating Defense Innovation . The panel will delve into how startups can effectively engage with defense contracts, secure funding for dual-use technologies, and contribute to critical national missions. It‚Äôs not just about building advanced technology; it‚Äôs about creating resilient ecosystems that foster rapid development and deployment of secure, reliable AI solutions. The insights shared will be invaluable for understanding the pathways to contributing to, and benefiting from, the growing defense tech market. Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 : Beyond the Blockchain While the name might suggest a focus solely on cryptocurrency, Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 is a much broader technology and venture capital event. It serves as a convergence point for the brightest minds across various tech sectors. This 20th-anniversary event is attracting a stellar lineup of tech and VC heavyweights, including leaders from Netflix, ElevenLabs, Wayve, and Sequoia Capital. They are all here to deliver the insights that fuel startup growth and sharpen your competitive edge. The ‚ÄòAI Defense‚Äô panel is a prime example of the event‚Äôs commitment to addressing the most pressing technological and societal challenges, proving that Disrupt 2025 is where the future of technology, across all domains, is discussed and shaped. The event runs October 27‚Äì29 at Moscone West in San Francisco. Unlocking Opportunities for AI Tech Startups For AI Tech Startups , the ‚ÄòAI Defense‚Äô panel and Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 offer unparalleled opportunities. This is your chance to: Gain Direct Insights: Hear directly from decision-makers and investors shaping defense and intelligence strategies. Network Strategically: Connect with potential partners, investors, and government representatives who are actively seeking innovative solutions. Identify Market Gaps: Understand the specific needs and challenges within national security that your technology can address. Explore Funding Avenues: Learn about investment frameworks and opportunities in the defense tech sector. The discussions will provide actionable insights for startups looking to navigate the complex landscape of government contracting and defense partnerships, highlighting pathways for your technology to make a real-world impact. Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity to position your company at the forefront of the next wave of defense technology. The ‚ÄòAI Defense‚Äô panel is set to be a cornerstone discussion at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025, offering a rare glimpse into the future of national security shaped by advanced AI. This is where the critical conversations happen, where leaders and innovators converge to address the most urgent challenges of our time. Whether you‚Äôre a startup founder, an investor, or a technologist, understanding the intersection of AI and defense is paramount. Secure your pass now to join 10,000+ startup and VC leaders for three days of insights and connections that will define what‚Äôs next. headline: Fed Rate Cuts: Goldman Sachs Predicts Crucial Shift After July Hold
summary: BitcoinWorld Fed Rate Cuts: Goldman Sachs Predicts Crucial Shift After July Hold In the dynamic world of global finance, every whisper from major institutions can send ripples across markets, and for those tracking the pulse of the economy, few voices resonate as strongly as Goldman Sachs. Recently, a significant forecast has emerged that could profoundly impact everything from your mortgage rates to your crypto portfolio: Goldman Sachs is now predicting a series of Fed rate cuts starting later this year, following an anticipated hold in July. This isn‚Äôt just a minor adjustment; it signals a potentially crucial shift in monetary policy, driven by evolving economic realities. Why Are Fed Rate Cuts on Goldman Sachs‚Äô Radar? According to insights shared by Walter Bloomberg on X, Goldman Sachs anticipates the U.S. Federal Reserve will maintain its current interest rates after its upcoming meeting. However, their outlook quickly pivots to a more dovish stance, projecting three subsequent rate reductions before the end of the year, followed by two more in early 2026. This aggressive forecast is rooted in two primary economic indicators: A Weakening Job Market: The once red-hot labor market, a bastion of strength for the U.S. economy, appears to be showing signs of cooling. A softening job market typically means fewer new hires, potentially rising unemployment, and slower wage growth. For the Fed, a looser labor market can signal that inflationary pressures from wages are easing, creating room to lower rates without reigniting price surges. Stagnant Consumer Spending: Consumer spending is the lifeblood of the American economy, accounting for a significant portion of GDP. If consumers are pulling back, perhaps due to inflation fatigue, higher borrowing costs, or economic uncertainty, it can signal a slowdown. Goldman Sachs‚Äôs assessment suggests that household budgets are feeling the pinch, leading to a deceleration in purchasing activity. These two factors combined paint a picture of an economy that might be slowing more rapidly than previously assumed, compelling the Fed to consider a pivot from its hawkish stance of fighting inflation to a more accommodative one aimed at stimulating growth. Understanding the Mechanics: How Do Fed Rate Cuts Work? When the Federal Reserve decides to cut interest rates, it typically lowers the federal funds rate, which is the target rate for overnight lending between banks. This seemingly small adjustment has a cascading effect throughout the financial system: Lower Borrowing Costs: Banks can borrow money more cheaply, which, in turn, allows them to offer lower interest rates on loans to consumers and businesses. This includes mortgages, auto loans, credit card rates, and business lines of credit. Stimulating Investment: Cheaper borrowing encourages businesses to invest in expansion, new equipment, and hiring, as the cost of financing these ventures decreases. Boosting Consumer Spending: Lower interest rates can make big-ticket purchases more affordable (e.g., houses, cars), and can free up disposable income for consumers who have variable-rate loans. Impact on Savings: Conversely, lower rates typically mean lower returns on savings accounts, certificates of deposit (CDs), and other interest-bearing investments. Currency Impact: Lower interest rates can make a country‚Äôs currency less attractive to foreign investors, potentially leading to its depreciation. Essentially, rate cuts are the Fed‚Äôs primary tool to inject liquidity and stimulate economic activity when it perceives a slowdown or recessionary risks. The Ripple Effect: What Do Anticipated Fed Rate Cuts Mean for You? The prospect of significant Fed rate cuts carries implications for various aspects of your financial life and investment strategies: For Homeowners and Buyers: Will Mortgages Get Cheaper? One of the most immediate and tangible impacts of Fed rate cuts is on the housing market. Lower federal funds rates generally translate to lower mortgage rates. For prospective homebuyers, this could mean increased affordability and a boost in purchasing power. Existing homeowners with adjustable-rate mortgages (ARMs) might see their monthly payments decrease. However, it‚Äôs important to remember that mortgage rates don‚Äôt move in lockstep with the federal funds rate, as they are also influenced by bond yields and market sentiment. For Savers: A Diminished Return? While borrowers rejoice, savers might face a less favorable environment. If the Fed cuts rates, banks typically follow suit by lowering the interest rates they offer on savings accounts, money market accounts, and CDs. This means your parked cash will earn less, potentially eroding its purchasing power over time, especially if inflation remains elevated. For Stock Market Investors: A Potential Tailwind? Historically, rate cuts are often seen as a positive for the stock market. Lower borrowing costs can boost corporate profits, and a stimulated economy generally leads to higher consumer demand. Companies find it cheaper to expand, innovate, and return capital to shareholders. Sectors like technology and growth stocks, which often rely on future earnings potential, can be particularly sensitive to interest rate changes. However, it‚Äôs crucial to note that the initial reason for cuts (a weakening economy) could cause some short-term volatility. For Cryptocurrency Holders: A New Narrative? The cryptocurrency market, while often seen as a distinct asset class, is not immune to macroeconomic forces. Lower interest rates can make traditional fixed-income investments less attractive, potentially pushing investors towards higher-risk, higher-reward assets like cryptocurrencies. Furthermore, a depreciating U.S. dollar (a potential consequence of rate cuts) could enhance the appeal of decentralized digital assets as alternative stores of value. Bitcoin, in particular, has sometimes been viewed as a ‚Äòdigital gold‚Äô that benefits from inflationary or loose monetary policies. The narrative around crypto as an inflation hedge or a growth asset could strengthen with significant Fed rate cuts . Challenges and Uncertainties on the Path to Fed Rate Cuts While Goldman Sachs has laid out a clear projection, the economic landscape is rarely straightforward. Several factors could challenge this outlook: Persistent Inflation: Despite recent cooling, inflation could prove stickier than anticipated, forcing the Fed to maintain higher rates for longer to avoid a resurgence of price pressures. Geopolitical Shocks: Unforeseen global events, such as conflicts or supply chain disruptions, could introduce new inflationary pressures or economic instability, altering the Fed‚Äôs calculus. Data Dependency: The Fed has repeatedly emphasized its data-dependent approach. Any unexpected strength in the job market or a rebound in consumer spending could lead them to reconsider or delay rate cuts. Market Expectations vs. Reality: Sometimes, market participants price in rate cuts too aggressively, and if the Fed doesn‚Äôt deliver, it can lead to disappointment and volatility. These uncertainties highlight the complex tightrope the Federal Reserve walks, balancing the need to control inflation with the imperative to support economic growth. Actionable Insights for Navigating the Era of Potential Fed Rate Cuts Given Goldman Sachs‚Äôs bold forecast, what steps can individuals and investors consider? Review Your Debt: If you have variable-rate debt (like certain credit cards or ARMs), now might be a good time to assess how lower rates could impact your payments. Consider refinancing fixed-rate debt if rates drop significantly. Re-evaluate Savings Strategies: With potentially lower returns on traditional savings, explore alternative avenues for growth, while maintaining an emergency fund in easily accessible accounts. Diversify Your Portfolio: A changing interest rate environment can favor different asset classes. Ensure your investment portfolio is diversified across various sectors and asset types, including potentially considering an allocation to digital assets if it aligns with your risk tolerance. Stay Informed: The Fed‚Äôs decisions are highly data-driven. Keep an eye on key economic indicators like inflation reports, employment figures, and consumer confidence surveys. The key is to remain agile and adapt your financial strategy to the evolving economic landscape. Conclusion: A Pivotal Moment for Monetary Policy Goldman Sachs‚Äôs projection of multiple Fed rate cuts beginning later this year marks a significant turning point in the economic narrative. Driven by a weakening job market and stagnant consumer spending, this shift could bring relief to borrowers, stimulate investment, and potentially reshape the outlook for various asset classes, including the burgeoning cryptocurrency market. While uncertainties remain, understanding these potential shifts is crucial for making informed financial decisions in the months ahead. The Fed‚Äôs next moves will undoubtedly be among the most watched events in global finance, and their impact will resonate far beyond Wall Street. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Fed Rate Cuts Q1: What exactly does Goldman Sachs predict regarding Fed rate cuts? Goldman Sachs expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to keep rates unchanged in July, then initiate three rate cuts in the latter half of this year, followed by two more cuts in early 2026. This forecast is based on observations of a weakening job market and stagnant consumer spending. Q2: How do Fed rate cuts typically affect the average consumer? For the average consumer, Fed rate cuts can lead to lower interest rates on various loans, including mortgages, auto loans, and credit cards, making borrowing cheaper. However, they also typically result in lower returns on savings accounts and certificates of deposit (CDs). Q3: What impact could these predicted Fed rate cuts have on the cryptocurrency market? Lower interest rates can make traditional investments less attractive, potentially encouraging investors to seek higher returns in riskier assets like cryptocurrencies. A weaker U.S. dollar, which can result from rate cuts, might also enhance the appeal of decentralized digital assets as alternative stores of value, potentially boosting crypto prices. Q4: What are the main reasons the Fed might decide to cut rates? The primary reasons the Federal Reserve typically considers cutting rates include signs of a slowing economy, such as a weakening job market, declining consumer spending, or a significant drop in inflation, all aimed at stimulating economic growth and preventing a recession. Q5: Are Goldman Sachs‚Äôs predictions guaranteed to happen? No, Goldman Sachs‚Äôs predictions are forecasts based on current economic data and their analytical models. The Federal Reserve‚Äôs decisions are data-dependent and can change based on evolving economic conditions, inflation trends, and unforeseen global events. Their outlook serves as a significant market expectation, but not a certainty. If you found this analysis insightful, please share it with your network! Help us spread awareness about these crucial economic developments and their potential impact on personal finance and investment strategies. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post Fed Rate Cuts: Goldman Sachs Predicts Crucial Shift After July Hold first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

headline: Bitcoin Surges Past $119,000: What‚Äôs Next for BTC Price?
summary: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Surges Past $119,000: What‚Äôs Next for BTC Price? The cryptocurrency world is abuzz with electrifying news: Bitcoin price has soared to an astonishing new level, breaking decisively above the $119,000 mark. This monumental leap, as reported by Bitcoin World market monitoring, sees BTC currently trading at $119,028.27 on the Binance USDT market. Such a significant milestone not only captures the attention of seasoned investors but also sparks immense curiosity among newcomers. What does this incredible surge signify for the broader crypto landscape, and what could be the driving forces behind this spectacular ascent? The Ascent of Bitcoin Price: A Closer Look at the Surge The recent climb of Bitcoin price above $119,000 is more than just a number; it represents a powerful testament to the digital asset‚Äôs enduring resilience and growing mainstream acceptance. For context, just a few years ago, a five-figure Bitcoin seemed like a distant dream for many. Now, we are witnessing a six-figure valuation, pushing boundaries and reshaping perceptions of digital wealth. This rapid appreciation underscores a fundamental shift in how global financial markets view cryptocurrencies. According to the latest data, the exact figure of $119,028.27 on Binance USDT market highlights the liquidity and active trading volume that often accompany such significant price movements. This specific data point, provided by Bitcoin World‚Äôs vigilant market monitoring, serves as a real-time snapshot of a market in full bullish swing. It‚Äôs a moment that prompts reflection on Bitcoin‚Äôs journey from an obscure digital experiment to a global financial phenomenon. What makes this particular surge so compelling is not just the speed, but the underlying conviction it suggests from a diverse range of market participants. Historically, Bitcoin‚Äôs journey has been marked by periods of explosive growth followed by corrections, a natural ebb and flow in any nascent asset class. However, each subsequent peak has generally surpassed the last, creating a pattern of higher highs and higher lows. This current surge above $119,000 fits squarely into that narrative, suggesting a maturation of the asset and a stronger foundational support from an expanding ecosystem of users, developers, and institutions. Understanding these historical patterns is crucial for appreciating the significance of the current Bitcoin price trajectory. What Factors Are Driving This Bitcoin Price Rally? When the Bitcoin price makes such an impressive move, it‚Äôs rarely due to a single factor. Instead, it‚Äôs often a confluence of macroeconomic trends, technological advancements, and shifting investor sentiment. Pinpointing these catalysts helps us understand the robustness of the current rally. 1. Institutional Adoption and ETF Inflows: One of the most significant drivers has been the increasing embrace of Bitcoin by institutional players. The approval and launch of spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) in major markets have opened the floodgates for traditional finance to gain exposure to BTC without directly holding the asset. These ETFs have seen unprecedented inflows, signaling strong demand from large investment firms, pension funds, and wealth managers. This institutional interest provides substantial capital injections and, perhaps more importantly, lends credibility and legitimacy to Bitcoin as a serious asset class, directly influencing its Bitcoin price . 2. The Bitcoin Halving Event: The quadrennial Bitcoin halving event, which reduces the supply of new Bitcoins entering the market, consistently acts as a powerful bullish catalyst. While the exact timing of the price impact can vary, the principle of reduced supply meeting sustained or increasing demand is a fundamental economic driver. Each halving has historically preceded a significant bull run, and the anticipation (and realization) of the most recent halving likely played a substantial role in setting the stage for the current upward pressure on the Bitcoin price . 3. Macroeconomic Tailwinds: In an era of global economic uncertainty, high inflation, and geopolitical tensions, Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a digital hedge against traditional financial instability. Investors are seeking alternative stores of value that are decentralized and not subject to the same inflationary pressures as fiat currencies. The narrative of Bitcoin as ‚Äòdigital gold‚Äô has gained traction, attracting capital from those looking to preserve wealth. Furthermore, potential shifts in central bank monetary policies, such as interest rate cuts, can make riskier assets like Bitcoin more attractive, influencing its Bitcoin price positively. 4. Growing Retail Investor Enthusiasm: Beyond institutional money, the retail sector continues to play a vital role. As Bitcoin price gains momentum, it attracts a fresh wave of individual investors, often fueled by fear of missing out (FOMO) and the allure of quick gains. Social media trends, mainstream news coverage, and easy-to-use trading platforms contribute to this renewed interest, creating a self-reinforcing cycle of demand that pushes prices higher. 5. Technological Advancements and Network Growth: Continuous improvements to Bitcoin‚Äôs underlying technology, such as the Lightning Network for faster and cheaper transactions, and ongoing development efforts, enhance its utility and scalability. A more robust and efficient network makes Bitcoin more appealing for everyday use and broader adoption, reinforcing its value proposition and supporting its Bitcoin price . Navigating the Volatility: What Does This Bitcoin Price Mean for Your Portfolio? The surge in Bitcoin price is undoubtedly exciting, but it also brings heightened volatility and important considerations for investors. Understanding how to react to such movements is key to managing your portfolio effectively. Opportunities and Considerations: Profit Realization: For long-term holders, a significant price increase offers an opportunity to realize gains. It‚Äôs crucial to have a pre-defined strategy for taking profits, whether it‚Äôs selling a portion of your holdings or rebalancing your portfolio. Portfolio Rebalancing: If Bitcoin now constitutes a disproportionately large part of your portfolio due to its appreciation, consider rebalancing. This involves selling some BTC to invest in other assets, maintaining your desired asset allocation and risk profile. Increased Market Attention: The surge brings more eyes to the crypto space, potentially leading to increased adoption and further innovation. This can be beneficial for the entire ecosystem. Actionable Insights for Investors: In a rapidly moving market, knee-jerk reactions can be costly. Here are some actionable insights to consider: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never invest based on hype alone. Understand the fundamentals of Bitcoin, its technology, and its market dynamics. Risk Management is Paramount: Only invest what you can afford to lose. The crypto market, despite its growth, remains highly speculative. Consider Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of trying to time the market, consider investing a fixed amount regularly. This strategy can smooth out volatility and reduce the risk of buying at a peak. Diversify Your Portfolio: While Bitcoin is a dominant force, explore other promising cryptocurrencies and traditional assets to spread risk. Stay Informed: Keep abreast of market news, regulatory developments, and technological advancements. Reliable sources like Bitcoin World are essential for timely updates on Bitcoin price movements. Looking Ahead: Will the Bitcoin Price Sustain This Momentum? The big question on everyone‚Äôs mind is whether the current Bitcoin price rally is sustainable. While predicting future market movements with certainty is impossible, we can analyze various scenarios and expert opinions. Potential Scenarios for Bitcoin Price: Continued Bull Run: Many analysts believe that with increasing institutional adoption, finite supply, and growing utility, Bitcoin has significant room for further growth. Targets well beyond $119,000 are often discussed, driven by network effects and a broader shift towards digital assets. Consolidation or Correction: After such a rapid ascent, a period of consolidation or even a healthy correction is not uncommon. Markets rarely move in a straight line, and profit-taking by early investors can lead to temporary pullbacks. These are often seen as opportunities for new investors to enter or existing ones to accumulate. Macroeconomic Headwinds: Unexpected shifts in global economic policy, such as aggressive interest rate hikes or a severe recession, could dampen investor appetite for risk assets, potentially impacting the Bitcoin price . Key Resistance and Support Levels: For traders, monitoring key technical levels is crucial. After breaking $119,000, the next psychological resistance levels might be at round numbers like $120,000, $125,000, and higher. Conversely, previous resistance levels, such as the former high points or significant psychological barriers, often turn into support levels during a pullback. Understanding these technical indicators can provide insights into potential price action. Long-Term Vision vs. Short-Term Fluctuations: For long-term investors, short-term fluctuations in Bitcoin price might be less concerning. The long-term thesis for Bitcoin often revolves around its role as a decentralized, censorship-resistant, and scarce digital asset. Its potential to disrupt traditional finance and serve as a global reserve asset continues to drive a strong fundamental case, irrespective of daily price swings. However, short-term traders will focus intently on these fluctuations for immediate opportunities. Challenges and Considerations for the Future of Bitcoin Price While the outlook for Bitcoin price appears optimistic, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge the challenges and considerations that could influence its future trajectory. A balanced perspective is crucial for any informed investor. 1. Evolving Regulatory Landscape: Governments worldwide are grappling with how to regulate cryptocurrencies. While some jurisdictions are adopting progressive frameworks, others remain cautious or even hostile. Clear, consistent, and favorable regulation could provide immense tailwinds, fostering greater institutional participation and consumer confidence. Conversely, restrictive or uncertain regulations could create headwinds, impacting market sentiment and the overall Bitcoin price . 2. Scalability and Transaction Costs: As Bitcoin‚Äôs adoption grows, its underlying blockchain faces challenges related to scalability and transaction costs during periods of high network congestion. Solutions like the Lightning Network aim to address this, but widespread implementation and user adoption are ongoing processes. The ability of Bitcoin to handle a massive volume of transactions efficiently will be vital for its long-term utility and, by extension, its value. 3. Environmental Concerns: The energy consumption associated with Bitcoin mining remains a significant point of contention. While efforts are being made to transition to more sustainable energy sources and improve mining efficiency, environmental concerns could lead to public pressure or even regulatory actions. Addressing these concerns effectively will be crucial for Bitcoin‚Äôs public image and its continued growth, potentially influencing its Bitcoin price . 4. Competition from Other Cryptocurrencies: While Bitcoin is the undisputed market leader, it faces competition from thousands of other cryptocurrencies, many of which offer different functionalities, faster transaction speeds, or alternative consensus mechanisms. While Bitcoin‚Äôs primary role as a store of value is distinct, innovation in the broader crypto space could draw attention and capital away from it, creating a dynamic competitive landscape. 5. Geopolitical and Economic Instability: While Bitcoin is often seen as a hedge against instability, extreme geopolitical events or severe global economic crises could have unpredictable effects. While some might flock to it as a safe haven, others might liquidate assets, including crypto, to cover immediate needs. The interplay between global events and Bitcoin price is complex and multifaceted. Conclusion: The recent surge of Bitcoin price above $119,000 marks a truly remarkable moment in the history of cryptocurrency. It underscores the growing maturity, institutional acceptance, and unwavering demand for digital assets. While the journey of Bitcoin is characterized by volatility, its long-term trajectory has consistently pointed upwards, driven by a powerful combination of limited supply, increasing utility, and a global shift towards decentralized finance. As we look ahead, navigating the market requires a blend of informed optimism, strategic patience, and diligent risk management. This milestone is not just about a number; it‚Äôs a powerful affirmation of Bitcoin‚Äôs evolving role in the global financial ecosystem, promising an exciting future for those who understand its potential. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does it mean for Bitcoin price to be above $119,000? A1: A Bitcoin price above $119,000 signifies a major milestone, indicating strong market confidence, increased demand, and potentially the beginning of a new phase of growth. It reflects significant institutional and retail interest, pushing the asset into uncharted territory. Q2: What are the primary drivers behind this recent Bitcoin price surge? A2: The surge is primarily driven by a combination of factors, including robust institutional adoption (especially through spot Bitcoin ETFs), the impact of the recent Bitcoin halving event on supply, macroeconomic conditions favoring alternative assets, and renewed enthusiasm from retail investors. Q3: Is it too late to invest in Bitcoin given its current price? A3: Whether it‚Äôs ‚Äòtoo late‚Äô depends on your investment goals and risk tolerance. While the Bitcoin price is high, many analysts believe it has long-term growth potential. Consider strategies like dollar-cost averaging (DCA) and only invest what you can afford to lose. Always conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Q4: What are the risks associated with investing in Bitcoin at this price level? A4: Despite its growth, Bitcoin remains a volatile asset. Risks include potential market corrections, regulatory uncertainties, competition from other cryptocurrencies, and the inherent speculative nature of the crypto market. It‚Äôs crucial to understand these risks and manage your portfolio accordingly. Q5: How can I stay informed about future Bitcoin price movements? A5: To stay informed, follow reputable cryptocurrency news outlets like Bitcoin World, monitor market analysis from trusted experts, keep an eye on macroeconomic indicators, and understand fundamental and technical analysis principles. Continuous learning is key in the dynamic crypto space. Share Your Thoughts and Spread the Word! Was this article helpful in understanding the monumental surge in Bitcoin price ? We encourage you to share your insights and predictions in the comments below. Don‚Äôt forget to share this article on your social media platforms to help others stay informed about this exciting development in the world of cryptocurrency! headline: Fidelity just bought over $120 million in Ethereum as institutional appetite surges
summary: Institutional demand for Ethereum ( ETH ) continues to accelerate, with Fidelity making one of the largest single-day purchases this week. According to blockchain analytics from Lookonchain , the Fidelity Ethereum Fund (FETH) added 33,788.82 ETH on July 22, worth approximately $124 million, bringing its total holdings to 629,202 ETH, valued at $2.33 billion at current market prices. July 22 Update: 10 #Bitcoin ETFs NetFlow: -1,477 $BTC (-$176.21M)üî¥ #ARK21Shares outflows 665 $BTC ($79.31M) and currently holds 49,586 $BTC ($5.91B). 9 #Ethereum ETFs NetFlow: +75,296 $ETH (+$278.45M)üü¢ #Fidelity inflows 33,953 $ETH ($125.56M) and currently holds 629,202‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/7G6IgZpMTd ‚Äî Lookonchain (@lookonchain) July 22, 2025 Recently there has been a strong broader institutional pivot toward Ethereum following the approval of spot ETH ETFs earlier this year. Across all listed Ethereum ETFs, net inflows have surged by 650,468 ETH over the past seven days, with total ETF holdings now surpassing 5.22 million ETH, equivalent to $19.31 billion. Major investment funds poor into Ethereum Meanwhile, BlackRock also expanded its Ethereum position , purchasing 27,158.86 ETH valued at nearly $100 million via its iShares Ethereum Trust (ETHA). The fund now holds 2.59 million ETH, making it the single-largest institutional holder of Ethereum among ETFs. Adding to the wave of activity, ARK Invest revealed a strategic acquisition of $182 million worth of BitMine Immersion (BMNR) shares. The move is designed to support the firm‚Äôs expanding Ethereum treasury strategy, as ARK looks to diversify its blockchain exposure through both direct holdings and infrastructure assets. Other major funds such as Grayscale, Bitwise, and VanEck also recorded substantial weekly inflows. Notably, Grayscale‚Äôs Ethereum Mini Trust saw a seven-day net inflow of 60,529 ETH, while Bitwise added 12,758 ETH. These inflows coincide with Ethereum‚Äôs growing role as an institutional-grade asset, bolstered by regulatory clarity and improving liquidity through ETF access. As capital continues to rotate into crypto funds, Ethereum appears to be cementing its position as a primary investment vehicle alongside Bitcoin. The post Fidelity just bought over $120 million in Ethereum as institutional appetite surges appeared first on Finbold .

headline: Maestro teams up with ICP to bring Ordinals & Runes to cross-chain Bitcoin DeFi
summary: Bitcoin DeFi infrastructure startup Maestro is collaborating with the Internet Computer Protocol to enable native, trustless access to Ordinals and Runes data for next-generation financial applications. Armed with a grant from the DFINITY Foundation, Maestro intends to create a native Bitcoin metaprotocol indexer that supports the trustless validation of Bitcoin assets like Ordinals and Runes within ICP-based DeFi applications. The new indexer is said to be a vital new infrastructure building block for Bitcoin DeFi developers, paving the way for seamless, collateralised cross-chain loans without relying on third-party custodians or vulnerable blockchain bridges. Maestro and ICP are natural bedfellows for such an initiative. The former is a leading blockchain infrastructure platform that provides scalable application programming interfaces, data services, and indexing solutions for developers building Bitcoin-based DeFi applications. Meanwhile, ICP has built a sophisticated Bitcoin integration that enables Internet Computer-based smart contracts, known as ‚ÄúCanisters‚Äù, to directly hold, send, and receive BTC assets by utilising its proprietary Chain Fusion technology, streamlining the way Bitcoin communicates with other blockchains. ICP‚Äôs Bitcoin integration supports some of the most popular DeFi applications in use today, including the BTC lending protocol Liquidium , the Bitcoin asset hub Omnity, and the Bitcoin memecoin trading platform Odin.Fun. Ordinals and Runes are new Bitcoin protocols that have attracted a lot of interest in the community, enabling users to create new kinds of digital assets on the world‚Äôs original blockchain platform, extending its utility. In the case of Ordinals , they enable data to be inscribed on individual satoshis, transforming them into non-fungible tokens on Bitcoin. Meanwhile, Runes are used to create fungible tokens on Bitcoin, which can be used for Bitcoin-based memecoins or NFTs. They offer greater flexibility and more scalability than Ordinals by encoding metadata directly into BTC transactions. Maestro‚Äôs new open-source Indexer is designed to support the validation of Ordinals and Runes directly within ICP Canisters , which are more advanced smart contracts that combine both code and data. In addition to providing all of the capabilities of traditional smart contracts, Canisters also support operating system processes and WebAssembly module instances, meaning they can be used to create secure messaging applications or facilitate decentralized token exchanges. For Bitcoin DeFi developers, the Indexer is a welcome development because trustless validation of Ordinals and Runes can help them to build more secure and reliable applications without bridges or intermediaries, which are some of the biggest vulnerabilities in the ecosystem today. It will support the creation of more efficient apps, such as Liquidium‚Äôs cross-chain loans. With Liquidium, users will be able to deposit Ordinal and Rune-based assets as collateral on the Bitcoin blockchain in order to borrow USDT based on Ethereum, without wrapping their tokens first, making the whole process much more secure. In fact, the Indexer will support any cross-chain DeFi application that wants a secure way to tap into Bitcoin-based liquidity. ‚ÄúNow we‚Äôre able to provide developers with direct, trustless access to Ordinals and Runes data to further enable the massive wave of innovation that relies on Chain Fusion‚Äôs unique ability to interact with Bitcoin without bridges or intermediaries,‚Äù said DFINITY Foundation Vice President of Growth Lomesh Dutta. Maestro said its Indexer is designed to ensure the utmost reliability, with enterprise-grade features such as mempool-awareness for faster responsiveness and security against blockchain reorganisations. Maestro co-founder and CEO Marvin Bertin said the Indexer is a necessary development that will strengthen ICP‚Äôs infrastructure by supporting the safe integration of Ordinals and Runes with Bitcoin DeFi. ‚ÄúThis partnership further strengthens ICP‚Äôs lead in the Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem and unlocks new functionality for users,‚Äù he added. The post Maestro teams up with ICP to bring Ordinals & Runes to cross-chain Bitcoin DeFi appeared first on Invezz

headline: AI GTM Strategies: Unleashing Revolutionary Growth for Startups at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025
summary: BitcoinWorld AI GTM Strategies: Unleashing Revolutionary Growth for Startups at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 In the rapidly evolving digital landscape, the advent of Artificial Intelligence (AI) is not just a technological shift; it‚Äôs a fundamental redefinition of how businesses operate, especially within the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain. For late-stage startups , the stakes are higher than ever. It‚Äôs no longer enough to have an innovative product; the way you take that product to market ‚Äì your Go-to-Market (GTM) strategy ‚Äì must evolve at an unprecedented pace. This crucial challenge will be at the forefront of discussions at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 , where industry leaders will unpack how AI GTM strategies are becoming the new imperative for survival and explosive growth. How AI GTM Strategies are Redefining Business AI isn‚Äôt merely enhancing existing processes; it‚Äôs fundamentally reshaping the entire GTM landscape. From identifying prospective customers to ensuring their long-term satisfaction, AI is introducing unprecedented levels of precision, personalization, and efficiency. This shift impacts every facet of a company‚Äôs interaction with its market. Consider the profound changes AI brings to key GTM functions: Sales Acceleration: AI tools can analyze vast datasets to identify high-potential leads, predict purchasing behavior, and even recommend optimal outreach times. This empowers sales teams to focus on meaningful interactions, significantly reducing wasted effort and shortening sales cycles. Predictive analytics can forecast sales trends with greater accuracy, allowing for better resource allocation and strategy adjustments. Marketing Personalization: AI enables hyper-segmentation of audiences, allowing marketers to deliver highly personalized content and offers at scale. From dynamic ad creatives that adapt to user behavior in real-time to AI-driven content generation for social media and email campaigns, marketing becomes more relevant and impactful. Sentiment analysis tools provide insights into brand perception, allowing for rapid response and reputation management. Customer Success & Retention: AI-powered chatbots and virtual assistants provide instant support, resolving common queries and freeing human agents for complex issues. More importantly, AI can predict customer churn by analyzing usage patterns and engagement metrics, allowing companies to proactively intervene with targeted retention strategies. Personalized onboarding flows and automated feedback loops ensure a smoother customer journey and foster loyalty. The integration of AI into these areas means GTM is no longer a linear funnel but a dynamic, interconnected ecosystem, constantly learning and optimizing. Navigating Startup Growth AI : Insights from Disrupt 2025 For startups, the promise of startup growth AI is immense, offering pathways to scale that were previously unimaginable. However, adopting AI isn‚Äôt without its challenges. The panel at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 will cut through the hype, providing a candid look at what‚Äôs genuinely working and what‚Äôs not in the real world of startup scaling. Attendees will gain insight into critical questions: Data Quality and Integration: How do you ensure your data is clean, accessible, and structured enough to feed AI models effectively? Many startups struggle with fragmented data sources. Talent and Skill Gaps: How do you build or acquire the AI expertise needed within your GTM teams without overhauling your entire organizational structure? Measuring ROI: What are the practical metrics for evaluating the return on investment for AI initiatives in sales, marketing, and customer success? Avoiding Derailment: How can startups integrate AI without disrupting existing workflows or alienating their teams? The focus must be on augmentation, not replacement, ensuring a smooth transition. The discussion will provide actionable strategies for leveraging AI to achieve efficient growth, streamline operations, and enhance the customer experience, all while maintaining focus and team cohesion. Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025: Your Hub for AI Business Transformation Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025, happening October 27‚Äì29 in San Francisco, is not just another conference; it‚Äôs a vital nexus for innovation where 10,000+ startup and VC leaders converge to shape the future. The ‚ÄòGoing Public Stage‚Äô panel, focusing on AI‚Äôs impact on GTM, is a highlight for anyone serious about AI business transformation . This event provides an unparalleled opportunity to: Connect with Leaders: Network with a diverse group of founders, investors, and industry veterans who are at the forefront of technological change. Discover New Technologies: Explore emerging AI solutions and tools that can be directly applied to your GTM challenges. Gain Strategic Insights: Learn from those who have successfully navigated complex market shifts and integrated AI into their core operations. Shape the Future: Be part of the conversation that defines the next wave of innovation, understanding how AI will continue to influence not just GTM, but product development and market dynamics. The panel discussion is designed to offer a deep dive into practical applications, moving beyond theoretical concepts to real-world implementation strategies for businesses aiming to thrive in an AI-first economy. The Imperative for Late-Stage Startups : Rewiring for AI For late-stage startups , the challenge of AI adoption is unique. Unlike agile early-stage companies that can build AI into their DNA from day one, established startups often contend with entrenched processes, existing tech stacks, and larger teams. The risk of being left behind is significant if they fail to adapt their GTM strategies to the new AI-powered paradigm. Rewiring GTM for late-stage startups involves: Strategic Re-evaluation: A thorough audit of current GTM processes to identify areas where AI can deliver the most significant impact and efficiency gains. This isn‚Äôt about minor tweaks but a fundamental rethink. Technological Integration: Seamlessly integrating AI tools with existing CRM, marketing automation, and customer service platforms. This often requires careful planning and execution to avoid disruption. Cultural Shift: Fostering a data-driven culture where teams are empowered to experiment with AI, learn from results, and embrace continuous optimization. It‚Äôs about empowering employees with AI, not replacing them. Talent Development: Investing in upskilling existing employees and strategically hiring new talent with AI expertise to drive the transformation. The panel at Disrupt will specifically address how these established companies can pivot effectively, leveraging their existing market position and resources to embrace AI, rather than be constrained by them. Actionable Insights: Integrating AI into Your GTM Motion Integrating AI into your GTM motion requires a strategic, phased approach. It‚Äôs not about throwing technology at a problem but about thoughtful implementation that aligns with business goals. Here are actionable steps for businesses: Identify Pain Points: Begin by pinpointing specific GTM areas where inefficiencies or bottlenecks exist. Is it lead qualification, content creation, or customer support? AI solutions are most effective when addressing clear challenges. Start Small, Learn Fast: Don‚Äôt attempt a massive overhaul immediately. Implement AI in a pilot program for a specific function or team. Gather data, analyze results, and iterate based on performance. Prioritize Data Infrastructure: AI thrives on data. Ensure your data is clean, organized, and accessible across different departments. Invest in robust data management systems to support AI initiatives. Foster Cross-Functional Collaboration: AI GTM isn‚Äôt just for the marketing team. Sales, product, and customer success teams must collaborate closely to ensure seamless integration and consistent messaging powered by AI insights. Focus on Augmentation, Not Automation: Position AI as a tool to enhance human capabilities, not replace them. Empower your teams with AI-driven insights to make better decisions and perform more effectively. Stay Ethical and Compliant: As you deploy AI, pay close attention to data privacy, bias in algorithms, and ethical considerations. Transparency and responsible AI use are crucial for maintaining customer trust. These insights, among many others, will be a core takeaway from the discussions at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025, providing a roadmap for practical AI integration. Meet the Visionaries: Speakers at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 The ‚ÄòGoing Public Stage‚Äô panel features a lineup of seasoned leaders who bring diverse perspectives on scaling businesses and leveraging technology. Their collective experience offers a holistic view of the challenges and opportunities in the AI-driven GTM landscape. Speaker Role & Company Key Experience & Perspective Nirav Tolia CEO, President, & Co-founder, Nextdoor Leads one of tech‚Äôs most recognized community platforms. Previously co-founded Epinions.com and was COO at Shopping.com. Brings deep insights into building and scaling consumer-facing platforms and community engagement, crucial for AI-driven personalization. Jane Alexander Partner, CapitalG Over 15 years of experience building and scaling GTM teams. Former CMO at Carta and held leadership roles at Salesforce and RelateIQ. Offers a venture capital perspective combined with hands-on experience in implementing GTM strategies for high-growth companies. Vanessa Larco Co-founder, Premise; Former Partner, NEA Background in product leadership and investing. Provides a sharp lens on how startups can grow efficiently and stay focused amidst AI‚Äôs reshaping of product and market strategies. Her insights bridge the gap between product innovation and market adoption. These speakers represent the pinnacle of strategic thinking in the tech and venture capital worlds, making their insights invaluable for any startup founder or leader. Snag Your July Discount and Get Ready for Disrupt 2025 Don‚Äôt miss this pivotal session ‚Äì and more than 200 others ‚Äì at the tech epicenter where 10,000+ startup and VC leaders connect to discover the next wave of innovation. This is your chance to gain a competitive edge, network with peers, and learn directly from the architects of tomorrow‚Äôs GTM strategies. Secure your place at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 now. Buy your tickets today and save up to $675 before July savings end. Furthermore, if you‚Äôre looking to put your brand in front of 10,000+ tech and VC leaders, amplify your reach, spark real connections, and lead the innovation charge, consider securing your exhibit space before your competitor does. The future of GTM is here, and it‚Äôs powered by AI. Be at Bitcoin World Disrupt 2025 to understand, adapt, and conquer. headline: Web3 Firm Hashed Emergent Drafts a Crypto Law It Hopes India Will Adopt
summary: Web3 firm Hashed Emergent has proposed a new model law, the ‚ÄúCOINS Act,‚Äù for crypto in India This private sector proposal includes creating a dedicated regulator and a ‚Äúsafe harbor‚Äù for ICOs The industry-drafted Act also calls for a national Strategic Bitcoin Reserve A new model law called the COINS Act has been proposed to bring clarity and structure to India‚Äôs digital asset regulatory environment. The draft law, announced this week by Web3 firm Hashed Emergent and policy group Black Dot, seeks to create an industry-driven policy system that balances innovation with oversight. The COINS Act focuses on defining digital asset rights and establishing clear regulations for the industry. A key part of the model law is its emphasis on ‚Äúcrypto-native constitutional rights,‚Äù such as the freedom of self-custody and financial privacy, which would form the legal foundation of India‚Äôs approach. Proposal for a new, dedicated crypto regulator A central component of the framework is the creation of a new regulatory body, the Crypto Assets Regulatory Authority (CARA). This new authority would be tasked with overseeing crypto activities specifically within India.‚Ä¶ The post Web3 Firm Hashed Emergent Drafts a Crypto Law It Hopes India Will Adopt appeared first on Coin Edition .

headline: Crypto needs minimum viable decentralization to guide performance-focused infrastructure
summary: DeFi‚Äôs obsession with maximum decentralization sacrifices performance. Minimum viable decentralization offers a pragmatic path to compete with TradFi.
